translation.en: [woman] Ladies and Gentlemen of the jury,
translation.zh: 陪审团的女士们先生们

translation.en: my client demands that the scales of justice be tipped in his favor.
translation.zh: 我的委托人要求 正义的天平要偏向于他

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen of the jury,
translation.zh: 陪审团的女士们先生们

translation.en: it is time to rip off the blindfold
translation.zh: 是时候揭开眼罩

translation.en: and let justice see.
translation.zh: 让正义看见

translation.en: Sorry, honey, you were really on a roll, but I got court in ten, so...
translation.zh: 抱歉 宝贝 你真的顺风顺水 但我十分钟后要上庭了 所以…

translation.en: I am liking that second version.
translation.zh: 我喜欢第二个版本

translation.en: Thanks! [chuckles] I should use the basement ladies' room more often.
translation.zh: 嘿 谢谢 我应该多利用 地下室的女厕所

translation.en: It's where all the magic happens.
translation.zh: 那是一切奇迹发生的地方

translation.en: [woman] These were supposed to be Jerome Johnson's golden years.
translation.zh: 这本该是杰罗姆·约翰逊的黄金岁月

translation.en: A widower, starting to date again.
translation.zh: 一名鳏夫 又开始约会了

translation.en: Crossing items off his bucket list,
translation.zh: 心愿单上的事项也在一个个完成

translation.en: like zipping around town on one of those hip electric scooters.
translation.zh: 比如骑着电动摩托车在城里飞驰

translation.en: What was not on his list was a broken hip
translation.zh: 他的愿望清单里可没有

translation.en: from being sideswiped by a city bus on Pike Street.
translation.zh: 在派克街被一辆公共巴士撞 造成髋部骨折

translation.en: The Seattle Transit Authority thwarts victims
translation.zh: 西雅图交通管理局打压受害者

translation.en: from pursuing damages by overwhelming them
translation.zh: 他们用令人困惑 毫无休止的繁文缛节

translation.en: with confusing, endless, bureaucratic red tape.
translation.zh: 来阻止受害者拿到赔偿

translation.en: They count on justice to turn a blind eye.
translation.zh: 他们指望正义对此被蒙蔽

translation.en: But it is time
translation.zh: 但是时候

translation.en: to rip off the blindfold
translation.zh: 撕掉眼罩

translation.en: and let justice see.
translation.zh: 让正义看见

translation.en: You saved my heinie in there, kid.
translation.zh: 你挽救了我的屁屁 孩子

translation.en: I'll find a way to pay you back.
translation.zh: 我会找办法报答你

translation.en: -I promise. -Don't worry about it.
translation.zh: -我保证 -别担心

translation.en: Just get home safe.
translation.zh: 平安回家

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Nah, I ghosted her. She gone.
translation.zh: 不 我跟她断绝了联系 她走了

translation.en: Nothing but net.
translation.zh: 空心球

translation.en: Excuse me, you... um...
translation.zh: 打搅 你…

translation.en: -Hey, sis! How'd it go? -Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿 妹妹 情况如何？ -嘿

translation.en: Score one for the good guys.
translation.zh: 好人得一分

translation.en: -[sighs] Congrats. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -恭喜 -谢谢

translation.en: Want to come over and celebrate? Gideon's teaching Oliver to make pizza.
translation.zh: 想要过来庆祝吗？ 吉迪恩正在教奥利弗做披萨

translation.en: We might be ordering that pizza.
translation.zh: 我们可能会预定那个披萨

translation.en: Uh... you know, I would. But I'm just kinda beat,
translation.zh: 你知道 我想来 但我就是非常累

translation.en: and I got a full inbox calling my name, so, rain check?
translation.zh: 我的收件箱都满了 所以改天好吗？

translation.en: Game night Friday.
translation.zh: 周五游戏之夜

translation.en: Yes, definitely.
translation.zh: 是的 当然

translation.en: Monopoly money's the only kind I'm going to be seeing this week.
translation.zh: 这周《大富翁》里的钞票 是我唯一能看见的钱

translation.en: -See ya. -Bye!
translation.zh: -再见 -再见

translation.en: -I'm ordering Domino's! -[Gideon] Ooh, That's smart.
translation.zh: -我预定达美乐比萨了 -明智的决定

translation.en: [man on radio] Good morning, Seattle. The forecast is rain, rain,
translation.zh: 早上好 西雅图 天气预告就是雨啊雨 没错 更多的雨

translation.en: and, yep, more rain.
translation.zh: 天气预告就是雨啊雨 没错 更多的雨

translation.en: And now it's time for the KNVB radio traffic report.
translation.zh: 现在请收听KNVB电台的交通报道

translation.en: [woman] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: No, Ms. Kapoor, just, just slow down.
translation.zh: 不 卡普小姐 说慢一点

translation.en: Okay, what's happening?
translation.zh: 好的 怎么回事？

translation.en: No, your landlord can not put a padlock on your front door.
translation.zh: 不 你的房东 不能在你的前门上装挂锁

translation.en: Double espresso for Nick. Pumpkin spice latte for Susan.
translation.zh: 尼克的双倍浓缩咖啡 苏珊的南瓜拿铁

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I'm sure.
translation.zh: 对 对 我确定

translation.en: Yes. No, I don't care what the notice says.
translation.zh: 对 不 我不在乎通知上怎么写

translation.en: I'm positive.
translation.zh: 我很肯定

translation.en: And it's not just immoral, by the way, it's illegal.
translation.zh: 这不仅仅是不道德 而且是违法的

translation.en: Yes. All right, well I'm gonna get into it with his lawyer
translation.zh: 对 好的 等我一回到办公室

translation.en: -as soon as I'm back at the office. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 我们会跟他的律师谈这件事

translation.en: Yes. I'm so sorry this is happening, you know, it's not--
translation.zh: 对 我很抱歉发生这种事 你知道 这不是…

translation.en: -Oh. -I'm so sorry, I just didn't see you.
translation.zh: 真是对不起 我没看见你

translation.en: Guess they forgot to patch me in.
translation.zh: 我想他们忘记把我加入对话中了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: No, I'm still here.
translation.zh: 不 我还在

translation.en: Yes, I will call you as soon as I can.
translation.zh: 对 我会尽快联络你

translation.en: [Nick] You know it's a scam, right?
translation.zh: 你知道这是骗局 是吗？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Pumpkin spice latte. No pumpkin in it.
translation.zh: 南瓜拿铁 里面根本没有南瓜

translation.en: -Just pumpkin flavoring. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 只是南瓜口味

translation.en: Every fall, the coffee industry acts like
translation.zh: 每年秋天 咖啡行业表现地好像

translation.en: some bountiful pumpkin harvest just came in,
translation.zh: 大丰收的南瓜到货了

translation.en: so they can peddle their drinks to the masses.
translation.zh: 所以他们可以向大众兜售他们的饮品

translation.en: You're drinking a lie.
translation.zh: 你喝的是一个谎言

translation.en: Why are you still talking to me?
translation.zh: 你为什么还在和我说话？

translation.en: I dunno, we're walking in the same direction?
translation.zh: 我没有 我们去的是同一个方向吗？

translation.en: Better to make conversation than have awkward silence, right?
translation.zh: 比起尴尬的沉默 聊天不是更好吗 对不？

translation.en: This is neither. This is an awkward conversation.
translation.zh: 不是这样 这是尴尬的聊天

translation.en: Well... then it's both.
translation.zh: 那么两者皆有

translation.en: -Can I help you with something? -The door? I have a 9 a.m. appointment.
translation.zh: -你到底有什么事？ -是这个门？我有9点的预约

translation.en: -Welcome to Whitaker and Associates. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -欢迎来惠特克联合律师事务所 -谢谢

translation.en: [both] Congratulations!
translation.zh: 恭喜你

translation.en: [Nick] Okay...
translation.zh: 好的…

translation.en: Where's the water cooler going?
translation.zh: 饮水机要搬到哪里去？

translation.en: The wave was part celebration, part smoke screen.
translation.zh: 我们做人浪部分为了恭喜 部分是障眼法

translation.en: Turns out, pro bono is Latin for tap water.
translation.zh: 原来公益服务的拉丁语 是自来水的意思

translation.en: If you're gonna work for free, I have to make budget cuts.
translation.zh: 如果你还是接官司不收费 我必须削减预算

translation.en: -[man 2] Buh-bye. -Buh-bye.
translation.zh: -再见 -再见

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: -Hello. -[shopkeepers bell chimes]
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Is it my birthday?
translation.zh: 是我生日吗？

translation.en: You must be Nick Evans. Nick is your 9 a.m..
translation.zh: 你肯定是尼克·埃文斯 尼克是你9点钟的客户

translation.en: This is awkward.
translation.zh: 现在这就尴尬了

translation.en: So... how can I help you, Mr. Evans?
translation.zh: 那么要我怎么帮你 埃文斯先生？

translation.en: I need a lawyer.
translation.zh: 我需要一位律师

translation.en: And you have a reputation of being one of the classiest
translation.zh: 城里在公交车座椅上宣传的律师中

translation.en: bus bench lawyers in town.
translation.zh: 你在最优秀的那一群中

translation.en: Never done a bus bench ad.
translation.zh: 我从来没在公交座椅上做过广告

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, what is it?
translation.zh: 抱歉 那叫什么？

translation.en: Is it ambulance chaser? Is that what it's called?
translation.zh: 冷血讼棍律师？是这么称呼吗？

translation.en: -Civil litigator works fine. -[Nick] Civil litigator.
translation.zh: -民权律师就可以 -民权律师

translation.en: That's cool. Alright, well, how much you charge?
translation.zh: 很酷 好的 你收费多少？

translation.en: -Let's talk about your complaint first. -[Nick] Right.
translation.zh: -我们先聊聊你的起诉 -好的

translation.en: I want to sue Love Guaranteed.
translation.zh: 我想控告恋爱保证

translation.en: -The dating website? -[Nick] Mm-hm.
translation.zh: -那个约会网站？ -对

translation.en: Okay. Were you threatened on a date?
translation.zh: 好的 你在约会时受到威胁了吗？

translation.en: Stalked? Harmed?
translation.zh: 跟踪？伤害？

translation.en: Worse. I'm a victim of fraud.
translation.zh: 更糟 我是诈骗受害者

translation.en: -Sorry? -Love Guaranteed is robbing people
translation.zh: -你说什么？ -恋爱保证打着

translation.en: of 29.95 a month
translation.zh: “你会找到爱 保证”的旗号

translation.en: with their slogan, "You'll find love, guaranteed."
translation.zh: 每个月从每名用户那里 抢劫29.95美元

translation.en: Well, I've been on 986 different dates,
translation.zh: 我进行过986次不同的约会

translation.en: and not one of them has provided me love.
translation.zh: 没有一次向我证明爱的存在

translation.en: Nine hundred and eighty-six dates with...
translation.zh: 986次约会…

translation.en: actual human women?
translation.zh: 跟真正的人类女人？

translation.en: Yes, the user agreement fine print states that
translation.zh: 对 用户协议的附属细则称

translation.en: a subscriber must go on 1000 different dates for the guarantee to apply.
translation.zh: 一名用户必须进行1000次 不同的约会才能获得保证

translation.en: Their lawyers clearly thought no one would go through with it, but...
translation.zh: 他们的律师显然觉得 没人能做到 但是…

translation.en: I did! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我做到了

translation.en: Well, home stretch anyways, I got like a dozen to go.
translation.zh: 反正进入冲刺阶段了 我还有差不多12次

translation.en: Yeah, I'm just...
translation.zh: 嗯 我就是…

translation.en: still a little in the weeds
translation.zh: 有点想知道

translation.en: on this whole 986 dates of it all.
translation.zh: 你总共986次约会的细节

translation.en: Uh... how is that even possible?
translation.zh: 这怎么可能呢？

translation.en: It's a great question. Uh, breakfast, lunch, and dinner dates.
translation.zh: 问得好 早餐 午餐和晚餐约会

translation.en: -That's how I do it [sighs]. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我就是这么做的 -好吧

translation.en: Guy's gotta eat, right?
translation.zh: 人总得吃饭 对吗？

translation.en: Did it ever occur to you that maybe
translation.zh: 你有没有想过也许

translation.en: love was never found because no woman wants to hear
translation.zh: 你永远找不到真爱 因为没有女人想听到

translation.en: "Guy's gotta eat, right"?
translation.zh: “人总得吃饭 对吗？”

translation.en: I'm not saying it at the date. I'm not like, "Hey, guy's gotta eat."
translation.zh: 我约会的时候不会这么说 我不会说：“嘿 人总得吃饭”

translation.en: I'm not doing that, that's not what I'm doing. I'm thinking it in my head.
translation.zh: 我不会那么说 我没那么说过 我就在心里想

translation.en: Look, the point is, I have a case.
translation.zh: 听我说 问题是 我有个官司

translation.en: Okay, a winnable case.
translation.zh: 好吧 能赢的官司

translation.en: I didn't pass the bar yesterday.
translation.zh: 我昨天没通过律师考试

translation.en: [whispering] I know what this is.
translation.zh: 我知道这是怎么回事

translation.en: [whispering] What is it?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: This is a classic "gotcha" lawsuit.
translation.zh: 这是经典的“逮到你了”诉讼

translation.en: Find a loophole, take the easy cash.
translation.zh: 找个漏洞 轻松赚钱

translation.en: Think what you want, but Love Guaranteed
translation.zh: 想想你要什么 但恋爱保证

translation.en: is profiting off the lonely souls of the world.
translation.zh: 利用世界上孤独的灵魂赚钱

translation.en: It is not right.
translation.zh: 这不对

translation.en: It is reckless endangerment of the human heart
translation.zh: 这是对人心的鲁莽伤害

translation.en: and I will not stand for it.
translation.zh: 我不会支持的

translation.en: [chuckles] The human heart! Right.
translation.zh: 人心 对啊

translation.en: It's good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: So, how much for a retainer?
translation.zh: 所以预付费用是多少？

translation.en: Let me review the merits of your case first.
translation.zh: 首先我要对你的官司价值进行评估

translation.en: Go ahead. Don't take too long.
translation.zh: 请便 别花太久

translation.en: Pretty sure your team
translation.zh: 非常确定你的团队

translation.en: would like the return of their water cooler.
translation.zh: 会想要拿回饮水机

translation.en: [Denise] How'd it go?
translation.zh: 情况怎么样？

translation.en: Someone looks like they could use a cocktail.
translation.zh: 有些人看起来可以喝杯鸡尾酒

translation.en: -[Susan] It's 9:15. -Never stopped me.
translation.zh: -现在才9点15分 -永远无法阻止我

translation.en: Oh. What else we got?
translation.zh: 哦 我们还有什么？

translation.en: [Roberto] Bills, bills,
translation.zh: 账单 账单

translation.en: and oh hey, look, more bills.
translation.zh: 看看啊 更多账单

translation.en: Mr. Bahar wants to defer payment another month.
translation.zh: 巴哈尔先生想再延期一个月付款

translation.en: And there's a scary-looking envelope from the landlord.
translation.zh: 房东寄来一个看起来很吓人的信封

translation.en: But I did put a Bed Bath and Beyond coupon in there, so it's not all bad news.
translation.zh: 但我的确准备一些 家居商城优惠券 所以不全是坏消息

translation.en: -You're doing the Lord's work, Denise. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -你是在做上帝的工作 丹妮丝 -谢谢

translation.en: He's raising the rent.
translation.zh: 他提高了租金

translation.en: -Again. -[Denise] It's just a hiccup.
translation.zh: -又一次 -这只是小问题

translation.en: We'll be fine.
translation.zh: 我们会没事的

translation.en: Say something.
translation.zh: 说点什么

translation.en: Is our goldfish okay?
translation.zh: 我们的金鱼还好吗？

translation.en: He's sleeping.
translation.zh: 他在睡觉

translation.en: He's sleeping?
translation.zh: 他在睡觉？

translation.en: [sighs] She can read me like a book.
translation.zh: 她对我了如指掌

translation.en: Why do I have a feeling I'm going to be seeing you in court some day?
translation.zh: 为什么我感觉有一天 我会看见你上法庭呢？

translation.en: -Okay. -How you feeling?
translation.zh: 好吧 你感觉如何？

translation.en: -[sighs] I'm dying and everything hurts. -Aw, buddy.
translation.zh: -我要死了 全身都疼 -哦 好姐妹

translation.en: Where's my glowing? You know, I was promised glowing.
translation.zh: 我的容光焕发哪里去了？ 有人保证我会容光焕发

translation.en: -You look great. -I'm fat.
translation.zh: -你看起来很棒 -我胖了

translation.en: But you're the really good kind of fat, you know?
translation.zh: 但你看起来真的是很健康的胖 你知道吗？

translation.en: Like a little avocado.
translation.zh: 像个小牛油果

translation.en: Excuse me while I drop my decaf in slow motion.
translation.zh: 我用慢动作放下我的脱咖啡因咖啡 你可别介意

translation.en: A dating site?
translation.zh: 约会网站？

translation.en: It's for a case.
translation.zh: 为了一个官司

translation.en: Wow, you are so taking this case.
translation.zh: 哇 你这么接到这个官司的

translation.en: No, he's the client.
translation.zh: 不 他就是客户

translation.en: -A hot client. -Gross client.
translation.zh: -火辣的客户 -恶心的客户

translation.en: Hot gross client.
translation.zh: 火辣恶心的客户

translation.en: Obnoxious, gross, hot only to a certain desperate kind of woman
translation.zh: 讨厌 恶心 只有某些绝望的女人觉得火辣的客户

translation.en: who is not me, still perspective client.
translation.zh: 反正还在审查客户的我不觉得

translation.en: -[Gideon] Hey, everybody! -[boy] Woo-hoo
translation.zh: 嘿 各位

translation.en: -Daddy! -Who wants Ben and Jerry's?
translation.zh: -爸爸 -谁想要班杰利？

translation.en: [mouthing] Not in front of the kid, or we have to share.
translation.zh: 别再孩子面前说 否则我们必须分享

translation.en: -Share what? -Nothing! Buddy, come here.
translation.zh: -分享什么？ -没什么 小子 过来

translation.en: -He's still wearing his dinner. -[Gideon] Yes, I see that.
translation.zh: -他身上还残留着晚饭 -是的 我看见了

translation.en: Okay, bath time, kiddo. Come on.
translation.zh: 好吧 洗澡了 儿子 快点

translation.en: High-five your Auntie Susan good night.
translation.zh: 跟你苏珊阿姨击掌道晚安

translation.en: Nice buddy. Night!
translation.zh: 好小子 晚安

translation.en: What did you eat exactly?
translation.zh: 你到底吃了什么？

translation.en: My brother-in-law might be an actual saint.
translation.zh: 我姐夫可能是个真正的圣人

translation.en: Hmm. Saint Gideon did not miraculously fall from the sky
translation.zh: 圣吉迪恩 并没有像冰冻的飞机马桶水一样

translation.en: like frozen airplane toilet water.
translation.zh: 奇迹般地从天上掉下来

translation.en: You know how we met?
translation.zh: 知道我们怎么认识的吗？

translation.en: -Yes, I know, online dating. -Mm-hm.
translation.zh: -我知道 在线约会 -对

translation.en: Can you believe this guy's been on almost a thousand dates?
translation.zh: 你相不相信 这家伙马上要完成1000次约会了？

translation.en: -Are you serious? -He's a classic loophole shark.
translation.zh: -你说真的吗？ -他是个钻空子的老手

translation.en: He's exploiting this company over a tiny detail in the fine print.
translation.zh: 他在公司细则的一个小细节上做文章

translation.en: -Interesting case. -Ridiculous case.
translation.zh: -有趣的官司 -荒谬的官司

translation.en: I mean, my mission is to help the helpless.
translation.zh: 我是说 我的任务是帮助无助的人

translation.en: He's not helpless. He's shameless.
translation.zh: 他不是无助 他是无耻

translation.en: -Shameless pays the bills. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 无耻的人买单

translation.en: It would mean that my employees could stop job hunting.
translation.zh: 也就是说我的雇员不用去找工作

translation.en: Roberto left his laptop open with his resume there.
translation.zh: 罗伯托的电脑开着 简历就显示在屏幕上

translation.en: I fixed a typo.
translation.zh: 我帮他改了一个错误

translation.en: Of course you did.
translation.zh: 你当然会改

translation.en: -[Nick] Hello? -Mr. Evans, hi, it's Susan Whitaker.
translation.zh: -喂？ -埃文斯先生 嗨 我是苏珊·惠特克

translation.en: We can start tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我们明天可以开始

translation.en: [Susan] Okay, team.
translation.zh: 好的 各位

translation.en: The first thing we need to do is take a deep dive
translation.zh: 我们首先要做的是深入了解

translation.en: into the strange and prolific dating life of Mr. Nicholas Evans.
translation.zh: 尼古拉斯·埃文斯先生 奇怪又丰富的约会生活

translation.en: Finally a fun case.
translation.zh: 终于接到有意思的官司了

translation.en: This case is not going to be a walk in the park.
translation.zh: 这个官司不会是轻松愉快的活

translation.en: Love Guaranteed is owned by none other
translation.zh: 恋爱保证的拥有者不是别人

translation.en: than Tamara Taylor.
translation.zh: 正是塔玛拉·泰勒

translation.en: [chuckles] We just won big time.
translation.zh: 我们中大奖了

translation.en: I'm sorry, Tiffany what now?
translation.zh: 抱歉 蒂芙尼什么？

translation.en: Tamara Taylor, the lifestyle guru
translation.zh: 塔玛拉·泰勒 那位生活方式大师

translation.en: who tells women to eat nothing but soaked almonds and to steam their...
translation.zh: 让女人只吃泡过的杏仁 然后蒸她们的…

translation.en: I'm caught up.
translation.zh: 我很忙

translation.en: She is Forbes 500-level loaded, meaning she is going to be lawyered up.
translation.zh: 她是福布斯500强富豪 也就是说她会请律师

translation.en: Our case has to be airtight.
translation.zh: 我们的官司必须无懈可击

translation.en: You know, I'm looking forward to taking on Love Guaranteed.
translation.zh: 你们知道 我一直期待着会一会恋爱保证

translation.en: Hi, Roberto, accounting.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是财务罗伯托

translation.en: Are you about to do the big speech?
translation.zh: 你要长篇大论进行演讲吗？

translation.en: Because if this is the big speech, I have to use the restroom first.
translation.zh: 如果如果你那么做 我必须先用洗手间

translation.en: All those corporate fat cats
translation.zh: 所有那些大公司肥猫

translation.en: and their $200 haircuts and their fancy watches.
translation.zh: 和他们价值200美元的发型 以及他们的名表

translation.en: They're not even gonna know what hit 'em.
translation.zh: 他们甚至不知道被什么打击到

translation.en: I should go, right?
translation.zh: 我应该走了 是吗？

translation.en: -You should go. -[Susan] No. Okay, sorry.
translation.zh: -你该走了 -不 好的 抱歉

translation.en: No big speech. Please, use the restroom. Meeting over.
translation.zh: 没有长篇演讲 要用洗手间请便 会议结束

translation.en: This is exciting! Standing up for the little guy.
translation.zh: 这太让人兴奋了 为小人物发声

translation.en: Online dating can just be so soul crushing.
translation.zh: 在线约会就是会让人心灵破碎

translation.en: I wouldn't know. Luckily, I've never tried it.
translation.zh: 我不知道 很幸运我从来没尝试过

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I'm sorry, you've never online dated?
translation.zh: 抱歉 你从来没有在网上约会过？

translation.en: No, what's the big deal?
translation.zh: 没有 有什么大不了？

translation.en: You can't win a case over something you know nothing about.
translation.zh: 你对这件事一无所知怎么能打赢官司

translation.en: We need to get you online.
translation.zh: 我们必须把你放到网上

translation.en: -Mm-hm. -No.
translation.zh: -嗯 -不要

translation.en: -[chuckling] Yeah! -[Susan] No!
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: No, I don't have time for dating.
translation.zh: 不要 我没时间约会

translation.en: It's not dating!
translation.zh: 这不是约会

translation.en: What if it's research? You know,
translation.zh: 如果这是研究呢？你知道

translation.en: it could make the difference between winning or losing this case.
translation.zh: 可能会决定本案的成败

translation.en: [Susan] What are you about to do here?
translation.zh: 你在这里干什么？

translation.en: -Creating your profile. -I thought you had to pee.
translation.zh: -创建你的档案 -我以为你的小便要憋不住了

translation.en: -It can wait. -This is so fun. [laughs]
translation.zh: -可以等等 -这真有意思

translation.en: Okay, fine. But listen, I am proofing it first.
translation.zh: 好的 好啊 但听好了 要让我先审查一遍

translation.en: Don't make me sound weird.
translation.zh: 别写得太离谱了

translation.en: Don't worry! We got this.
translation.zh: 别担心 我们明白

translation.en: Hey just for fun, what photo were you thinking--
translation.zh: 你们开心就好 你们考虑用什么照片…

translation.en: [both] Go!
translation.zh: 快走吧

translation.en: -chuckles] -Oh, I like that.
translation.zh: 哦 这个我喜欢

translation.en: -[Roberto] Ooh! -[Denise] Right?
translation.zh: 对吗？

translation.en: -I don't know if men would. -Oh.
translation.zh: -我不知道男人喜不喜欢 -哦

translation.en: It's both helpful and a little bit creepy
translation.zh: 既有用又有点奇怪

translation.en: that you meticulously documented all of your dates.
translation.zh: 你详细记录了所有的约会情况

translation.en: Thank you. [sighs] Figured I'd need a paper trail.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我就想着需要纸质的证明

translation.en: The one who talked about cats all night?
translation.zh: 整夜谈论猫的女性？

translation.en: Yeah, didn't even own a cat.
translation.zh: 对 她都不养猫

translation.en: The one who brought her parents on the date?
translation.zh: 约会时带父母来的女性？

translation.en: Yeah. She never said a word, but her dad was awesome.
translation.zh: 对 她一个字都没说 但她爸很棒

translation.en: I mean, we talked about baseball for hours, it was great.
translation.zh: 我们聊了好几个小时的棒球 非常的棒

translation.en: I wish I would've got his number.
translation.zh: 我希望我当时问他要号码了

translation.en: The one who needed a date to her sister's wedding.
translation.zh: 需要对象 一起参加她姐姐婚礼的女性？

translation.en: Yeah, two tickets to Hawaii seemed kind of extra for date numero dos.
translation.zh: 对 两张去夏威夷的票 对于约会备胎来说似乎有点多了

translation.en: The one who got drunk and tried to fight the busboy?
translation.zh: 喝醉而且想和服务员打架的女性？

translation.en: For the record? I took the punch.
translation.zh: 准确地说 我喝了潘趣酒

translation.en: Okay, Nick, you cannot name these women like they're episodes of Friends.
translation.zh: 好的 尼克 你不能用《老友记》 剧名的风格给女性取名字

translation.en: It's the only way to keep them apart, you know how many Chloes I've dated?
translation.zh: 这是区分她们的唯一办法 你知道我跟多少个克洛伊约会过吗？

translation.en: Fourteen!
Plus 12 Emmas and like, half a dozen Zoes.
translation.zh: 再加上12个艾玛 还有6个佐伊

translation.en: Okay, little accountability please. You're the one dating in bulk.
translation.zh: 好吧 请有点责任感 你是那个和很多人约会的人

translation.en: This lawsuit isn't just about me, you know.
translation.zh: 你知道 这起官司不仅仅和我有关

translation.en: Love Guaranteed took advantage of them, too.
translation.zh: 恋爱保证也在利用她们

translation.en: So what are you gonna do if we win?
translation.zh: 如果我们胜诉你打算怎么办？

translation.en: You're gonna split the damages with a thousand different women?
translation.zh: 你会跟一千位不同的女性 分享赔偿金吗？

translation.en: No, I have plans for that money.
translation.zh: 不 这笔钱的用途我有打算

translation.en: I bet you do.
translation.zh: 我想也是

translation.en: And just so you know, I was always a perfect gentleman to them.
translation.zh: 就告诉你 在她们面前 我一直是一位完美绅士

translation.en: I took these women on classy dates.
translation.zh: 我让这些女士有了优雅的约会

translation.en: Split the check at Denny's?
translation.zh: 在丹尼斯餐厅各自付账？

translation.en: No disrespect to the Grand Slam Breakfast, but give a guy some credit, okay?
translation.zh: 不是说对它的大满贯早饭有意见 但要给别人一点信任 好吗？

translation.en: Breakfast at Bacco, lunch at Pink Door, and dinner at Coral.
translation.zh: 早饭在八客餐厅 中饭在粉门餐厅 晚饭在珊瑚餐厅

translation.en: Coral? That place is fancy.
translation.zh: 珊瑚餐厅？那地方很赞

translation.en: Yes. And I paid every time.
translation.zh: 是的 每次都是我付钱

translation.en: Alright, I'm impressed.
translation.zh: 好吧 让我印象深刻

translation.en: More with your time management than anything.
translation.zh: 你真是时间管理大师

translation.en: Yeah? Got most dates down to under an hour.
translation.zh: 是吗？大多数约会都在一小时内

translation.en: Quicker than an oil change.
translation.zh: 比换机油的时间都快

translation.en: Okay, do you have a heart,
translation.zh: 好吧 你有心吗？

translation.en: or just an empty space where you keep your car keys?
translation.zh: 或者那个位置是空的 你用来放车钥匙？

translation.en: Yeah, it's empty.
translation.zh: 对 是空的

translation.en: -I gotta go. -[Susan] Hot date?
translation.zh: -我得走了 -燃情约会？

translation.en: -[Nick] Yep. -What?
translation.zh: -对 -什么？

translation.en: That was a bad joke, it's 10 a.m.
translation.zh: 那是个拙劣的笑话 现在才早上10点

translation.en: Yeah. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner dates.
translation.zh: 对 早饭 午饭和晚饭都约会

translation.en: It's breakfast.
translation.zh: 这个是早饭

translation.en: [sighs] You poor, poor girls.
translation.zh: 你这个可怜可怜的姑娘

translation.en: I know I'm married, but I'd love to see him in my chambers.
translation.zh: 我知道我结婚了 但我想在我的房间里看见她

translation.en: For a debriefing.
translation.zh: 为了做简报

translation.en: He's an opportunist.
translation.zh: 他是一个机会主义者

translation.en: We should be ashamed for taking this case.
translation.zh: 接这个官司我们应该觉得羞耻

translation.en: -[man 2] Hello. -Ain't no shame in this game.
translation.zh: -喂 -在这个游戏里一点都不丢人

translation.en: [Denise] Precious cargo coming through!
translation.zh: 贵重物品通过

translation.en: Ooh, I love our new paying client.
translation.zh: 我喜欢我们新的付钱客户

translation.en: We'll see about that.
translation.zh: 我们走着瞧

translation.en: -What is that? -[Susan] Files.
translation.zh: -那是什么？ -文件

translation.en: From Nick's dates. In order for this case to fly,
translation.zh: 尼克的约会资料 为了让这个官司起飞

translation.en: all of them have to be corroborated, so good luck with that.
translation.zh: 所有人必须得到证实 所以祝你们好运

translation.en: [both] Incoming!
translation.zh: 新邮件

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: We just went live.
translation.zh: 我们刚刚上线

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Your inbox for Love Guaranteed.
translation.zh: -你在说什么？ -你在恋爱保证上的收件箱

translation.en: You were supposed to let me proof it first!
translation.zh: 你们应该先让我审阅的

translation.en: [exhales deeply] Why would you use that photo?
translation.zh: 你们为什么要用这张照片？

translation.en: It was the only picture we could find where you weren't working.
translation.zh: 这是我们能找到的 唯一一张你没在工作的照片

translation.en: That's from my birthday at Tortilla Flats, I was wasted.
translation.zh: 那是我在托提拉弗拉特 过生日的照片 烂醉如泥

translation.en: [Roberto] A drink-y Susan is a dateable Susan.
translation.zh: 喝醉的苏珊是充满魅力的苏珊

translation.en: [Susan scoffs] I do dip my french fries in mayo.
translation.zh: 我真的用薯条来蘸蛋黄酱

translation.en: I do like old dogs better than puppies.
translation.zh: 我真的喜欢老狗胜过小狗

translation.en: Wait, how do you guys know all this stuff about me?
translation.zh: 等等 你们怎么知道我的这些事？

translation.en: -Lots of overtime. -I went through your garbage.
translation.zh: -长时间的加班 -我翻看过你的垃圾

translation.en: They're lighting up like planes on a runway.
translation.zh: 它们就像跑道上的飞机一样闪闪发光

translation.en: No. No. Maybe.
translation.zh: 不行 不行 有可能

translation.en: No, not right now, no.
translation.zh: 不 现在不行 不

translation.en: I have to interview Nick's dates for their depositions.
translation.zh: 我必须采访尼克的约会对象 拿到证词

translation.en: Which you can do while going on dates of your own. #Research.
translation.zh: 你自己约会的时候 能做什么 研究

translation.en: Mr. Yang next door is willing to offer you a friends and family lunch discount.
translation.zh: 隔壁的杨先生愿意 为你提供朋友和家人的午餐折扣

translation.en: I do love Yang's.
translation.zh: 我真的很喜欢杨氏餐厅

translation.en: He's weirdly as excited as we are.
translation.zh: 他和我们一样奇怪

translation.en: For research.
translation.zh: 为了研究

translation.en: Ooh, how about this one in the flannel?
translation.zh: 这个穿法兰绒的怎么样？

translation.en: Looks like a lumberjack.
translation.zh: 看起来像伐木工人

translation.en: -Like an educated lumberjack. -That's not a thing.
translation.zh: -看起来像是受过教育的伐木工人 -没有这种人

translation.en: -A lumbersexual? -Oh, that's a thing.
translation.zh: -伐木型男 -哦 这个靠谱

translation.en: Uh... hi there. My name's Susan Whitaker,
translation.zh: 你好 我叫苏珊·惠特克

translation.en: I'm an attorney in the area.
translation.zh: 我是本地律师

translation.en: I was just wondering, did you ever go on a date with Nicholas Evans?
translation.zh: 我就是想知道 你和尼古拉斯·埃文斯约会过吗？

translation.en: Yes, I remember him. Because he actually looked like his photo.
translation.zh: 是的 我记得他 因为他跟照片上看起来一样

translation.en: Some dates don't look like their photos?
translation.zh: 有些约会对象和照片上不一样？

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: So how'd the date go?
translation.zh: 约会怎么样？

translation.en: -It was the best date I've ever been on. -Mm-hm.
translation.zh: -是我经历过最好的约会 -嗯

translation.en: Wish he would've asked for my number!
translation.zh: 希望他当时问我要了号码

translation.en: Nick was the best. Just a nice, normal guy.
translation.zh: 尼克是最棒的 就是个心善的正常小伙

translation.en: Like, super normal.
translation.zh: 就是非常正常

translation.en: Some dates are abnormal?
translation.zh: 有些约会对象不正常？

translation.en: So, intermittent fasting, huh?
translation.zh: 所以是间歇性断食吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: As in you just purposely don't eat?
translation.zh: 你就是故意不吃东西？

translation.en: -I'm actually up to 20 hours a day now. -Wow.
translation.zh: -我现在每天断食20个小时 -哇

translation.en: isn't that dangerous, or...
translation.zh: 这没有危险吗 或者…

translation.en: No, it's super good for you.
translation.zh: 不会 对你的健康很有益处

translation.en: It's actually how...
translation.zh: 实际上…

translation.en: cavemen used to... to eat.
translation.zh: 穴居人就是这么…吃的

translation.en: Wasn't the life expectancy for a caveman like, 25?
translation.zh: 穴居人的预期寿命不是只有25岁吗？

translation.en: [plates shattering] Check!
translation.zh: 买单

translation.en: So, tell me about your date with Nick Evans.
translation.zh: 所以跟我聊聊 你的约会对象尼克·埃文斯

translation.en: The date was fine, but I knew he wasn't for me. I got a vibe.
translation.zh: 约会不错 大那我知道他不适合我 我能感觉到

translation.en: What kind of a vibe?
translation.zh: 哪种感觉？

translation.en: It's like Nick believes he's genuinely looking for love.
translation.zh: 就是尼克相信 他真的在寻找真爱

translation.en: But instead he's trying to prove that love doesn't exist.
translation.zh: 但他一直在努力证明真爱并不存在

translation.en: Did you ever find a date to your sister's wedding?
translation.zh: 那你找到人跟你一起参加婚礼了吗？

translation.en: -It was canceled. -Oh.
translation.zh: 婚礼取消了

translation.en: Turns out the groom's in love with my mom, and not my sister.
translation.zh: 结果新郎爱上了我妈 不是我姐姐

translation.en: Could you die?
translation.zh: 是不是要死？

translation.en: Wow. Holidays must be interesting at your house.
translation.zh: 放假的时候你家肯定很有意思

translation.en: At least Nick showed up.
translation.zh: 至少尼克露面了

translation.en: My last online date totally ghosted me.
translation.zh: 我前一个网上约会对象 彻底跟我玩失踪

translation.en: Some dates just don't show up?
translation.zh: 有些人就不露面吗？

translation.en: You guys, I don't know how Nick managed it.
translation.zh: 各位 我不知道尼克是怎么做到的

translation.en: I don't.
translation.zh: 我做不到

translation.en: I've been on two dates and one no-show, and I am exhausted.
translation.zh: 我约会了两个人 一个没出现 我已经累死了

translation.en: Why do you think I proposed to Dante after two weeks? It's a jungle out there.
translation.zh: 你为什么认为两周后 我要向丹特求婚？外面是丛林

translation.en: [Denise] There's plenty of fish in the sea. [Roberto] There's also plenty of trash.
translation.zh: -海里的鱼多得是 -也有很多垃圾

translation.en: -The affidavits for Nick to sign. -[Susan] I'll drive them over.
translation.zh: 要尼克签字的宣誓书 我开车送过去

translation.en: [Denise] I can e-mail them and he can docu-sign.
translation.zh: 我可以发电子邮件 他可以在网上签

translation.en: Are you kidding me? I'm beyond curious to see where this guy works.
translation.zh: 你开玩笑吗？ 我很好奇这家伙在哪里工作

translation.en: I bet you he's a Crossfit instructor.
translation.zh: 我打赌他是混合健身教练

translation.en: Probably runs an illegal poker game out of a parking garage.
translation.zh: 也许在停车场外面 组织非法的扑克游戏

translation.en: Surprise, you're both wrong.
translation.zh: 惊喜 你们两个都错了

translation.en: -[Nick] Let's go, man. -Some might call this elder abuse.
translation.zh: -加油 -也许有人认为这是虐待老人

translation.en: -Faster, okay? -Alright. [out of breath]
translation.zh: -再快点 好吗？ -好

translation.en: Once I'm on my feet,
translation.zh: 一旦我能走路了

translation.en: I'm gonna ask Donna over there to go dancing. Hey, Donna.
translation.zh: 我要邀请那边的唐娜去跳舞 嘿 唐娜

translation.en: You ever been dipped in an Argentine tango?
translation.zh: 你跳过阿根廷探戈吗？

translation.en: Be careful, she's a maneater.
translation.zh: 小心点 她是母老虎

translation.en: Oh, here's hoping.
translation.zh: 哦 有希望了

translation.en: Jerome, you nasty.
translation.zh: 杰罗姆 你真调皮

translation.en: Wait. What...
translation.zh: 等等 怎么…

translation.en: What is happening?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: My crusader for justice.
translation.zh: 我的正义卫士

translation.en: Okay, so many things are finally making sense.
translation.zh: 好的 所以很多事情最后都说得通了

translation.en: I didn't know you made house calls.
translation.zh: 我不知道你还上门服务

translation.en: I'm just doing my due diligence.
translation.zh: 我就是来做尽职调查

translation.en: Right, checking up on me.
translation.zh: 对 调查我

translation.en: -Something like that. -Making sure I'm an upstanding citizen.
translation.zh: -差不多吧 -确保我是一个正直公民

translation.en: -And he's making me a standing up citizen. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 他正在让我成为一个 站得正直的公民

translation.en: Alright, comedian, I'll see ya Thursday. I'll be with you in two seconds.
translation.zh: 好的 喜剧演员 我们周四见 两秒后我和你见面

translation.en: So, you're how I landed my new client.
translation.zh: 所以我是靠你找到新客户的

translation.en: -Told you I wouldn't forget. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 告诉你我不会忘记

translation.en: Tossed business your way. Surprised?
translation.zh: 把生意丢给你 惊喜吧？

translation.en: Nick is surprising.
translation.zh: 尼克是个惊喜

translation.en: Doctor said, my dancing days are over.
translation.zh: 医生说 我的舞台生涯结束了

translation.en: Nick said, hogwash.
translation.zh: 尼克说 胡说八道

translation.en: Nick donates his time here
translation.zh: 尼克把时间花在这里

translation.en: for the old folks like me that can't afford PT.
translation.zh: 为了像我这样 负担不起物理治疗的老家伙

translation.en: He's a good egg. Like you.
translation.zh: 他是个好蛋 跟你一样

translation.en: And two good eggs make an omelet.
translation.zh: 两个好蛋做成一个煎蛋卷

translation.en: -Donna. -[stutters]
translation.zh: 唐娜

translation.en: Okay. So what do we got?
translation.zh: 好的 那么有什么事？

translation.en: Just a few things for you to sign.
translation.zh: 有些东西要你签字

translation.en: It's just the bottom there.
translation.zh: 即使底下这里

translation.en: Cool. Oh, guess what?
translation.zh: 哦 猜怎么着？

translation.en: -What? -[Nick] Tomorrow's it.
translation.zh: -什么？ -就在明天

translation.en: My one thousandth date.

translation.zh: 以及其他欺诈行为

translation.en: so... here we are.
translation.zh: 所以…我们来了

translation.en: Ms. Whitaker, have you ever been to Pangong Tso in Tibet?
translation.zh: 惠特克小姐 你去过西藏的班公错吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: It is a transformative place.
translation.zh: 那是一个能改变人的地方

translation.en: I went on a two-month, barefoot walkabout through the high grasslands,
translation.zh: 我去了两个人 赤足在高原上行走

translation.en: asking myself, "What is my purpose on Earth?"
translation.zh: 扪心自问 “我在世界上的目的是什么？”

translation.en: One day, a lone bird swooped across the sky
translation.zh: 有一天 一只寂寞的小鸟 从空中俯冲而过

translation.en: and I felt loneliness to the deepest core of my essence and I thought,
translation.zh: 我的内心深处感到了孤独 我开始思考

translation.en: -"I will solve loneliness." -[Nick snorts]
translation.zh: “我要解决孤独的问题”

translation.en: My website brings much needed hope, love, connection, joy,
translation.zh: 我的网站给大众带来了希望 恋爱

translation.en: happiness, life to the masses.
translation.zh: 联系 快乐 幸福 生活

translation.en: [Susan] Except that you're not selling love, joy, and hope.
translation.zh: 只不过你不是在兜售 恋爱 欢乐和希望

translation.en: You're selling a love guarantee.
translation.zh: 你是在兜售恋爱保证

translation.en: Everyone here knows that that language is legally binding.
translation.zh: 这里的每个人都知道 这种语言是有法律约束力的

translation.en: So.
translation.zh: 所以

translation.en: We have a case. You all know it. What are you offering?
translation.zh: 我们有个官司 你们都知道了 你们能提供什么？

translation.en: Bill?
translation.zh: 比尔？

translation.en: Well, we have a very generous settlement to offer.
translation.zh: 我们可以提供一个 非常丰厚的和解条件

translation.en: One hundred thousand dollars, with a signed non-disclosure agreement.
translation.zh: 签下保密协议 就能拿10万美金

translation.en: We can cut the check today.
translation.zh: 我们今天就能付款

translation.en: One hundred thousand dollars wouldn't even begin to cover the expenses
translation.zh: 10万美元都不够支付

translation.en: of my client's dates.
translation.zh: 我客户约会的花费

translation.en: We request five hundred thousand in restitution,
translation.zh: 我们要求50万美元的赔偿

translation.en: the promise that your company scrubs all language of a love guarantee
translation.zh: 你们公司还要承诺 从网站和广告中撤下

translation.en: from its website and advertising,
translation.zh: 所有语言种类的恋爱保证字样

translation.en: and I would also obviously need to review any NDA before my client can sign it.
translation.zh: 而且很明显在我的客户 签署任何保密协议前 我都要审查

translation.en: [scoffs] I'm sorry, this isn't a negotiation.
translation.zh: 抱歉 这不是讨价还价

translation.en: We've looked into you, Ms. Whitaker, and we see that
translation.zh: 我们调查过你 惠特克小姐 我们发现

translation.en: your earnest little boutique firm is under water. You're failing.
translation.zh: 你热心的精品小律所举步维艰 你正在坠落

translation.en: This little do-gooder,
translation.zh: 这种爱做好事小善意

translation.en: crusader for justice attitude, it might impress your clients
translation.zh: 正义卫士的态度 可能会给你的客户留下深刻印象

translation.en: but it doesn't do anything for me.
translation.zh: 但对我没有任何效果

translation.en: I, well... [scuffs]
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: Luckily, we are not here to talk about me.
translation.zh: 幸运的是 我们在这里不是谈我的情况

translation.en: We are here to discuss this case.
translation.zh: 我们来是讨论这个官司的

translation.en: [Bill] Then take the settlement.
translation.zh: 那么接受和解

translation.en: -We won't offer it again. -[Tamara] Buddha once said,
translation.zh: 机会就这么一次 佛曰

translation.en: "No man can step in the same river twice."
translation.zh: “没人可以踏进同一条河两次”

translation.en: Do you know why I hired Susan?
translation.zh: 你知道为什么我雇苏珊吗？

translation.en: -Nick, no! -Because she's the opposite of you.
translation.zh: -尼克 不要 -因为她和你正好相反

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: She has character and principles,
translation.zh: 她有个性有原则

translation.en: and a sense of common decency.
translation.zh: 还知道基本的礼节

translation.en: -Thank you. -[Tamara] Hmm.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Well, I have a billion dollar empire to run,
translation.zh: 我有10亿美元的帝国要打理

translation.en: so just sign the papers and we'll pay you out
translation.zh: 所以签了吧 我们付钱让你们走人

translation.en: and this little PR headache will go away.
translation.zh: 这个小公关麻烦也烟消云散了

translation.en: No deal.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: We will see you in court,
translation.zh: 我们法庭上见

translation.en: where we will request one million dollars in punitive damages.
translation.zh: 到时候我们的赔偿金会是100万美元

translation.en: Oh, and by the way,
translation.zh: 哦 顺便提下

translation.en: it's Heraclitus, not Buddha.
translation.zh: 那句话是赫拉克利特说的 不是佛陀

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: The river quote? Yeah.
translation.zh: 那个什么河的？对

translation.en: Those inspirational fridge magnets, they have such tiny fine print.
translation.zh: 那些鼓舞人心的冰箱贴 上面有非常小的字

translation.en: Really gotta read it carefully.
translation.zh: 真的要仔细读

translation.en: Boom.
translation.zh: 砰

translation.en: The water is gross.
translation.zh: 这个水好难喝

translation.en: [Susan whispers] Are they staring at us?
translation.zh: 他们盯着我们吗？

translation.en: Yep, all of them.
translation.zh: 对 所有人

translation.en: -[Susan] Should've taken the stairs. -[Nick] Yep.
translation.zh: -应该走楼梯的 -对

translation.en: -What? I mean-- -That was--
translation.zh: -什么？我是说… -那个…

translation.en: Who's idiotic idea was it to guarantee love, anyway?
translation.zh: 不管怎么样 谁想出恋爱保证这个愚蠢的主意的？

translation.en: -Who am I firing today? -[Bill] Uh...
translation.zh: 我今天要解雇谁？

translation.en: Yours.
translation.zh: 你

translation.en: Micah, you're fired.
translation.zh: 弥迦 你被解雇了

translation.en: -That was awesome. -If Tamara Taylor thinks
translation.zh: -真棒 -如果塔玛拉·泰勒觉得

translation.en: that she can steamroll us, she's got another think coming!
translation.zh: 她能把我们压得喘不过气来 她应该再想想

translation.en: -[elevator dings] -Yeah... thing.
translation.zh: 嗯…考虑

translation.en: -Another thing coming. -No, it's think, like,
translation.zh: -再考虑 -不 想想 就是

translation.en: "think again."
translation.zh: 再想想

translation.en: Ha! No, it's thing.
translation.zh: 不 考虑

translation.en: -Do you always have to be right? -Only when the other person's wrong.
translation.zh: 你老是要争个对错吗？ 在其他人错的情况下

translation.en: Hey, thank you.
translation.zh: 嘿 谢谢

translation.en: For standing up for me in there. That really meant a lot.
translation.zh: 刚才为我挺身而出 真的对我意义重大

translation.en: You stand up for people all day, someone's gotta have your back.
translation.zh: 你整天为其他人挺身而出 得有人做你的后援

translation.en: You really went in on that song, didn't you?
translation.zh: 你真的喜欢那首歌 是吗？

translation.en: The tape is actually stuck in the player.
translation.zh: 实际上是磁带卡在播放器里了

translation.en: -Right. -Has been since the 80s.
translation.zh: -对 -从80年代到现在

translation.en: -Mm-hm. -The volume knob is also broken,
translation.zh: 音量旋钮也坏了

translation.en: so Zorro decides when it plays and when it doesn't.
translation.zh: 所以佐罗自行决定 什么时候播 什么时候停

translation.en: So your car is possessed by Tiffany.
translation.zh: 所以你的车被蒂芙尼占据了

translation.en: -Basically. -Great.
translation.zh: -基本上是的 -太棒了

translation.en: -Why don't you get it fixed? -Oh, it's on the list.
translation.zh: -你为什么不送去修？ -哦 它在我的待办清单上

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Nick] How long is your list?
translation.zh: 你的清单有多长？

translation.en: [Susan] How long you got?
translation.zh: 你有时间听吗？

translation.en: [Nick] So, Susan says,
translation.zh: 所以苏珊说

translation.en: "It's not Buddha, it's Heraclitus." [chuckles]
translation.zh: “不是佛陀 是赫拉克利特说的”

translation.en: -Who's that? -No clue.
translation.zh: -那是谁？ -不知道

translation.en: The point is, she was amazing.
translation.zh: 重点是 她太棒了

translation.en: I mean, I've never seen anything like that in my life.
translation.zh: 我是说 我这辈子没见过这样的人

translation.en: She was beautiful, she was poised.
translation.zh: 她美丽 她沉着

translation.en: You know, for a man who's been on a thousand dates,
translation.zh: 你知道 对于一个 约会过1000次的男人来说

translation.en: you got zero game.
translation.zh: 你是零游戏那方

translation.en: What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？

translation.en: I'm talking about Susan.
translation.zh: 我在说苏珊

translation.en: Sus-- No.
translation.zh: 苏…不

translation.en: Susan...
translation.zh: 苏珊…

translation.en: That's my lawyer. She's... no. Off the table.
translation.zh: 那是我的律师 她…不行 免谈

translation.en: Last I checked, she was a woman first.
translation.zh: 上次我查看 她首先是个女人

translation.en: A smart, beautiful, compassionate woman.
translation.zh: 一位聪明美丽有激情恶女人

translation.en: -I don't know, Jerome, that's-- -[sighs]
translation.zh: 我不知道 杰罗姆 那是…

translation.en: What's holding you back?
translation.zh: 什么让你犹豫不前？

translation.en: You just went on a thousand dates and you're afraid to go on one more?
translation.zh: 你刚完成1000次约会 你害怕再多一次吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but Susan's not like the rest.
translation.zh: 对 但苏珊跟其他人不一样

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Scary, isn't it?
translation.zh: 很可怕吧？

translation.en: You've been playing in the shallow end, where it's safe.
translation.zh: 你一直在浅水区游 很安全

translation.en: That ain't where you gonna find love.
translation.zh: 但在那里你找不到真爱

translation.en: To find that, you gotta dive deeper.
translation.zh: 要找到真爱 你得去深水区

translation.en: What if I sink?
translation.zh: 如果我淹死了呢？

translation.en: What if you swim?
translation.zh: 如果你会游泳呢？

translation.en: [man] Susan Whitaker?
translation.zh: 苏珊·惠特克？

translation.en: Charles Gilbert, Seattle Courier.
translation.zh: 查尔斯·吉尔伯特 《西雅图差报》

translation.en: How do you plan to take on Love Guaranteed?
translation.zh: 你计划要怎么拿下恋爱保证？

translation.en: Do you really believe Nick Evans has a case?
translation.zh: 你真觉得尼克·埃文斯有证据？

translation.en: -How did you hear that I-- -Slow news week, I was
translation.zh: -你从哪里听说我… -这周新闻不多

translation.en: trolling courthouse filings, jackpot!
translation.zh: 我一直在翻法庭的案卷 中奖

translation.en: Ex-pro ball player suing a dating site, now that's a human interest piece.
translation.zh: 前职业球员起诉一家约会网站 这个大家会感兴趣

translation.en: No comment.
translation.zh: 无可奉告

translation.en: Ms. Whitaker, if I could just get a moment--
translation.zh: 惠特克小姐 再给我点时间…

translation.en: A reporter just accosted me about Nick's case.
translation.zh: 一名记者刚刚跟我聊尼克的官司

translation.en: I know, isn't it exciting?
translation.zh: 我知道 难道不让人兴奋吗？

translation.en: -What'd you say? -No comment.
translation.zh: -你怎么说？ -无可奉告

translation.en: It was pretty cool. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 非常酷

translation.en: But listen, we need to focus on getting ready for the trial,
translation.zh: 但听好了 我们需要集中精神准备审判的事

translation.en: not playing this case out in the press.
translation.zh: 而不是在媒体前玩弄这个官司

translation.en: -You're no fun. Bill Jones called. -Oh.
translation.zh: 你真是无趣 比尔·琼斯打过电话来

translation.en: [Roberto] We already have a court date.
translation.zh: 我们定了开庭日期

translation.en: This is only six weeks away.
translation.zh: 只有六周了

translation.en: Alright, we can do this. We gotta buckle down.
translation.zh: 好的 我们能做到 我们必须全力以赴

translation.en: I need nights and weekends.
translation.zh: 晚上和周末都要加班

translation.en: And Denise, light that candle you do when the Seahawks are playing.
translation.zh: 丹妮丝 海鹰队比赛时点亮蜡烛

translation.en: Anything for the team.
translation.zh: 为球队付出一切

translation.en: [both whisper] Seahawks.
translation.zh: 海鹰队

translation.en: Come on, focus.
translation.zh: 加油 集中精神

translation.en: Oh, where are you going, boss?
translation.zh: 哦 你去哪里 老大？

translation.en: Love Guaranteed is definitely going to be going after Nick's character
translation.zh: 恋爱保证绝对会追着尼克的性格打

translation.en: and we can't afford for there to be any surprises
translation.zh: 我们负担不起任何惊喜

translation.en: so I did a little Google stalking.
translation.zh: 所以我到网上搜索了一下

translation.en: Did you find dirt?
translation.zh: 你发现黑料了？

translation.en: Not that I want you to. But let's be honest, I love dirt.
translation.zh: 我不希望你那么做 但老实说 我喜欢黑料

translation.en: [Susan] Yes. So, look.
translation.zh: 是的 所以 看

translation.en: Nick's not on social media anymore, but I did find some crumbs.
translation.zh: 尼克已经退出所有社交媒体了 但我还是找到一些踪迹

translation.en: Her name's Arianna Silver.
translation.zh: 她的名字叫阿丽安娜·西尔弗

translation.en: -She was not one of the thousand dates. -[Susan] Nope.
translation.zh: -她不在那1000个约会对象里 -是的

translation.en: And we've got to cover our bases, so...
translation.zh: 我们要确保胜利 所以…

translation.en: I'm gonna go meet with her today.
translation.zh: 我今天要去和她见面

translation.en: -O-M-G, she's gorgeous. -[Susan] I guess.
translation.zh: -天哪 她很美 -我想也是

translation.en: You know, if you're into the whole supermodel thing.
translation.zh: 如果你喜欢超模的话

translation.en: -Everyone is. -Most people are.
translation.zh: -大家都喜欢 -大多数人都喜欢

translation.en: Okay, give me the phone.
translation.zh: 好的 把电话还给我

translation.en: -What? -[shopkeepers bell chimes]
translation.zh: 干吗？

translation.en: Holy crap.
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: Hi, you must be Susan.
translation.zh: 嗨 你肯定是苏珊

translation.en: I'm Arianna.
translation.zh: 我是阿丽安娜

translation.en: -[Arianna] Thank you. -[Susan] Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -谢谢

translation.en: Nick Evans.
translation.zh: 尼克·埃文斯

translation.en: I haven't heard that name in a minute. How is Nicky?
translation.zh: 我有段时间没听过这个名字了 小尼怎么样？

translation.en: Nick is well.
translation.zh: 尼克很好

translation.en: He is suing a dating website for making false claims.
translation.zh: 他正在起诉一家约会网站 指控后者虚假宣传

translation.en: As I told you on the phone, I'm his attorney.
translation.zh: 如同我在电话里跟你说的 我是他的律师

translation.en: Sounds like Nick.
translation.zh: 听起来是尼克的风格

translation.en: Always calling out a liar.
translation.zh: 总是要把骗子揪出来

translation.en: So anyway, I'm looking into his dating history.
translation.zh: 反正我在调查他的约会史

translation.en: I haven't heard from Nick since the breakup. He took it hard.
translation.zh: 分手后我就没有听到他的消息了 他分得很坚决

translation.en: Very hard.
translation.zh: 非常坚决

translation.en: So you didn't keep in touch?
translation.zh: 所以你没有跟他保持联系

translation.en: [Arianna] We broke up over two years ago.
translation.zh: 我们是两年前分手的

translation.en: My fault. It didn't end well.
translation.zh: 我的错 最后很不好看

translation.en: Radio silence ever since.
translation.zh: 从那以后就没联系过

translation.en: [Susan] Right but you said two years.
translation.zh: 对 但你说两年

translation.en: Thank you for your time. Your relationship predates my case.
translation.zh: 谢谢你和我见面 你们的关系发生在我的官司之前

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: If Nick didn't tell you about me,
translation.zh: 如果尼克没跟你说起过我

translation.en: -how did you find me? -[Susan] Oh.
translation.zh: 你怎么找到我的？

translation.en: Just some old social media accounts.
translation.zh: 就是一些旧的社交媒体账号

translation.en: You've been doing some digging.
translation.zh: 你一直在深挖

translation.en: For the case, of course.
translation.zh: 为了办案 当然

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: I'll just show myself out.
translation.zh: 我自己出去吧

translation.en: Kitchen.
translation.zh: 厨房

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.zh: 哦 不

translation.en: [Nick sighs] Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: There's secret texting codes now?
translation.zh: 现在还有秘密短信代码了？

translation.en: You've been on two, almost three internet dates now.
translation.zh: 你现在有两个 差不多三个网上约会对象了

translation.en: -You haven't learned the lingo yet? -[Susan] Obviously not.
translation.zh: -你还没学会这些黑话吗？ -显然没有

translation.en: I just wanted to see if you were awake to, you know, go over a couple things.
translation.zh: 我就是想知道如果你醒了 要给你探讨几件事

translation.en: To go over-- Wait, you're still at work?
translation.zh: 探讨…等等 你还在工作吗？

translation.en: So?
translation.zh: 所以呢？

translation.en: You are not a normal human being.
translation.zh: 你不是一个正常的人类

translation.en: Fine, what about tomorrow then?
translation.zh: 好吧 那么明天怎么样？

translation.en: [Nick] Tomorrow's Saturday.
translation.zh: 明天是周六

translation.en: What's your point?
translation.zh: 你想说什么？

translation.en: [Nick] My point is it's Saturday.
translation.zh: 我想说的是明天是周六

translation.en: [Susan] The one who ate paper.
translation.zh: 吃纸的女性

translation.en: -[Nick] Yeah. All kinds. -[Susan] What?
translation.zh: -对 所有类型 -什么？

translation.en: -[Susan] No. -[Nick] Yep. Napkins, toilet paper.
translation.zh: -不 -是的 餐巾纸 厕纸

translation.en: -[Nick] Playing cards. -[Susan] No.
translation.zh: -纸牌 -不

translation.en: [Nick] Not kidding. Origami...
translation.zh: 不开玩笑 折纸…

translation.en: [Susan] I don't believe you,
translation.zh: 我不相信你

translation.en: but I am looking forward to meeting this probably fictional person.
translation.zh: 但我很期待 和这个可能是虚构的人见面

translation.en: You know, you're not the cheesy swindler I had you pegged for.
translation.zh: 你不是我认为那种虚伪的骗子

translation.en: -Oh, yeah? -[Susan] Mm-mm.
translation.zh: -哦 是吗？ -嗯

translation.en: You're not the uptight lawyer I assumed you were.
translation.zh: 你也不是我以为的 那种脾气不好的律师

translation.en: Happy to be wrong for once.
translation.zh: 很高兴自己错了一次

translation.en: Wrong? Okay.
translation.zh: 错了？好吧

translation.en: -Just enjoying that, sorry. -Yeah, well...
translation.zh: -就享受其中吧 抱歉 -嗯 那么…

translation.en: But you might be a little bit right.
translation.zh: 但你也许有那么一点是对的

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
translation.zh: 哦 是吗？

translation.en: The first thing I do when I wake up in the morning is check my phone.
translation.zh: 我早上起床的第一件事是查看手机

translation.en: Answer e-mails before I even get out of bed,
translation.zh: 甚至在起床前就回复邮件

translation.en: go to the office all day,
translation.zh: 整天泡在办公室

translation.en: then I come home, finish everything I didn't get done at the office,
translation.zh: 然后我回家 做完所有在办公室没做完的事

translation.en: then I get back in bed
translation.zh: 然后我上床

translation.en: with my phone,
translation.zh: 带着我的手机

translation.en: and it starts over again. It's a vicious circle.
translation.zh: 然后又再来一遍 这是恶性周期

translation.en: Cycle.
translation.zh: 循环

translation.en: -What? -It's a "vicious cycle."
translation.zh: -什么？ -这是恶性循环

translation.en: -That's the saying. -No, it's "vicious circle."

translation.zh: 我们马上就能发现

translation.en: There she is. Ms. Taylor!
translation.zh: 她来了 泰勒小姐

translation.en: Blessings.
translation.zh: 祝福你们

translation.en: Check out my lifestyle blog.
translation.zh: 访问我的生活方式博客

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Is that a new suit? It looks good.
translation.zh: 是新外套吗？看起来很棒

translation.en: Let's get this show on the road.
translation.zh: 我们让好戏开演吧

translation.en: [man] Ms. Whitaker and Mr. Evans, a moment of your time, please.
translation.zh: 惠特克小姐和埃文斯先生 请稍等

translation.en: [woman] Mr. Evans, how many dates have you been on?
translation.zh: 埃文斯先生 你进行了多少次约会？

translation.en: Can I have an statement, Mr. Evans?
translation.zh: -你有什么想说的吗？ -有声明吗 埃文斯先生？

translation.en: [Susan] What price
translation.zh: 为了找到真爱

translation.en: would you pay to find love?
translation.zh: 你们愿意付出什么代价？

translation.en: Almost anything, right?
translation.zh: 几乎一切 对吗？

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: for 29.95, which includes use of their website and app,
translation.zh: 每月支付29.95美元 包括使用网站和应用

translation.en: Love Guaranteed guarantees that you will find love.
translation.zh: 恋爱保证保证你会找到真爱

translation.en: All you have to do is go on a thousand dates.
translation.zh: 你要做的就是进行1000次约会

translation.en: That's right. One thousand different dates.
translation.zh: 没错 跟1000个人约会

translation.en: I went on two and a half Love Guaranteed dates,
translation.zh: 我参加了两次半恋爱保证的约会

translation.en: and well, that was quite enough for me, thank you.
translation.zh: 对我来说足够了 谢谢

translation.en: My client, Nicholas Evans,
translation.zh: 我的客户 尼古拉斯·埃文斯

translation.en: followed the rules.
translation.zh: 遵循了这条规则

translation.en: He went on one thousand dates. But...
translation.zh: 他完成了1000次约会 但是…

translation.en: Love Guaranteed did not deliver on their promise.
translation.zh: 恋爱保证没有实现他们的承诺

translation.en: Nick Evans did not find love.
translation.zh: 尼克·埃文斯没有找到真爱

translation.en: Over the course of this trial, the evidence will prove
translation.zh: 在审判过程中 证据将会证明

translation.en: that Love Guaranteed cares far more about profits than they do the well-being
translation.zh: 恋爱保证更关心的是自己的利润 而不是他们会员的

translation.en: of their subscribers.
translation.zh: 幸福

translation.en: Nicholas Evans
translation.zh: 尼古拉斯·埃文斯

translation.en: asks that you hold Love Guaranteed responsible
translation.zh: 要求恋爱保证

translation.en: for their wrongful actions.
translation.zh: 为你们的错误行为负责

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Mr. Jones, your turn.
translation.zh: 琼斯先生 轮到你了

translation.en: [Bill] Thank you, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 谢谢 法官大人

translation.en: The defendant stands by Love Guaranteed's brand messaging.
translation.zh: 我们作为被告 支持恋爱保证的品牌信息

translation.en: Love is guaranteed for those truly looking for it.
translation.zh: 真正寻找的人保证能得到爱

translation.en: Now, during this trial, the defense will establish
translation.zh: 在这个审判期间 被告将会证明

translation.en: that Nick Evans had zero intention of finding love.
translation.zh: 尼克·埃文斯根本不想寻找真爱

translation.en: This lawsuit isn't about trade practices or false advertising. No.
translation.zh: 这起诉讼与贸易惯例或虚假广告无关

translation.en: It's a bargain basement gotcha lawsuit
translation.zh: 这是一次低劣的“逮到你了”诉讼

translation.en: all about the money.
translation.zh: 就是为了钱

translation.en: Now, the evidence will show Nick Evans,
translation.zh: 现在证据将显示尼克·埃文斯

translation.en: having previously been burned by love,
translation.zh: 曾经被爱灼伤

translation.en: had no intention of finding love again.
translation.zh: 再也不想寻找真爱

translation.en: Sure, Mr. Evans may have been on a thousand dates.
translation.zh: 没错 埃文斯先生 也许完成了1000次约会

translation.en: But the evidence will show he was just ticking them off in pursuit of a payday.
translation.zh: 但证据将表明 他只是为了拿钱而完成任务

translation.en: So, at the conclusion of this trial,
translation.zh: 所以在审判结束时

translation.en: the good people of the jury will find for Love Guaranteed
translation.zh: 陪审团里的好人会发现 爱是有保证的

translation.en: and dismiss all charges.
translation.zh: 并驳回所有指控

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [whispering] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Dr. Rossmore, for the record, what is your field of expertise?
translation.zh: 罗斯莫尔博士 为了记录在案 你的专业领域是什么？

translation.en: Well I have a PhD in Psychology,
translation.zh: 我拥有心理学博士学位

translation.en: and I teach human behavior and the sciences at the university.
translation.zh: 我在大学里教授人类行为和科学

translation.en: My specialty is attachments and relationships.
translation.zh: 我的专业是依恋和关系

translation.en: Primarily the science of love.
translation.zh: 主要是爱的科学

translation.en: And in your professional opinion,
translation.zh: 按照你的专业观点

translation.en: are there any known ways to guarantee love?
translation.zh: 有什么已知的方法来保证爱情吗？

translation.en: All the conclusions agree there is no way
translation.zh: 所有结论都同意没有方法

translation.en: to predict love, much less guarantee it.
translation.zh: 来预测爱情 更别说保证了

translation.en: [Susan] No further questions.
translation.zh: 没有问题了

translation.en: Why didn't you object?
translation.zh: 你为什么不反对？

translation.en: The doctor is an expert witness, there was nothing to object to.
translation.zh: 那位博士是专家证人 没什么可以反对的

translation.en: -Why do you keep hitting me? -Because you like it.
translation.zh: -你为什么老是打我？ -因为你喜欢

translation.en: No, I don't.
translation.zh: 不 我不喜欢

translation.en: And how did the date go?
translation.zh: 约会的情况怎么样？

translation.en: Nick asked all about me.
translation.zh: 尼科一直在问我的情况

translation.en: First time that's ever happened on an internet date.
translation.zh: 网上约会这是第一次

translation.en: Am I right, ladies?
translation.zh: 对吗 女士们？

translation.en: Did you ever feel like Nick was just going through the motions?
translation.zh: 你有没有觉得尼克只是装模作样？

translation.en: -Uh... No, he was really nice. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -没有 他人真的很好 -谢谢

translation.en: -[screaming] Yes! -Baby girl!
translation.zh: -好啊 -宝贝女儿

translation.en: And how did you leave it?
translation.zh: 你怎么离开的？

translation.en: Nick insisted on paying the bill, walked me to my car,
translation.zh: 尼克坚持他来付钱 并护送我到车旁边

translation.en: shook my hand good night. The perfect gentleman.
translation.zh: 和我握手 跟我道晚安 完美的绅士

translation.en: Thank you for your time today.
translation.zh: 谢谢你今天抽出时间

translation.en: Defendant's witness.
translation.zh: 有请被告提问

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 别这样

translation.en: You expect us to believe Mr. Out For A Quick Buck
translation.zh: 你指望我们相信 出来赚快钱先生

translation.en: didn't intentionally throw the date?
translation.zh: 没有故意放弃约会？

translation.en: No, like I said. Perfect gentleman.
translation.zh: 没有 正如我说的 完美的绅士

translation.en: Uh-huh. Then why didn't you go out again?
translation.zh: 那你为什么没有再出去？

translation.en: It's internet dating. Click and move on. That's how it goes.
translation.zh: 这是互联网与会 点击移动 这就是它的运作方式

translation.en: No, how it goes is Nick Evans had zero intention of finding love,
translation.zh: 不 问题是尼克·埃文斯 无意寻找真爱

translation.en: -and he manufactured-- -Objection, Your Honor.
translation.zh: -他操纵了… -反对 法官大人

translation.en: [judge] Sustained.
translation.zh: 反对有效

translation.en: [witness] Actually, can I answer?
translation.zh: 实际上 我能回答吗？

translation.en: Nick and I went on one date.
translation.zh: 尼克和我约会过一次

translation.en: It's impossible to say what was in his heart.
translation.zh: 不可能知道他内心想什么

translation.en: But I hope he does find love one day. He deserves it.
translation.zh: 但我希望他有一天能找到真爱 因为他值得拥有

translation.en: We all do.
translation.zh: 我们都值得拥有

translation.en: No further questions.
translation.zh: 没有问题了

translation.en: He's coming off like a saint in there, what is your plan?
translation.zh: 他表现地就像个圣人 你的计划是什么？

translation.en: -Don't worry. -Don't touch me!
translation.zh: -别担心 -别碰我

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Tomorrow, we're going to tear apart Nick's character and motivation
translation.zh: 明天我们将通过深入研究 他的人际关系

translation.en: by delving into his relationships.
translation.zh: 撕开尼克的性格和动机

translation.en: Both past and present.
translation.zh: 包括现在的和过往的

translation.en: [woman] Look, they're coming!
translation.zh: 看 他们来了

translation.en: Ms. Taylor, can I get a statement for Rise and Shine Seattle?
translation.zh: 泰勒小姐 我是《闪亮西雅图》的记者 你有话要说吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it's a silly lawsuit.
translation.zh: 是的 这是愚蠢的诉讼

translation.en: We are still the best dating website you can subscribe to.
translation.zh: 我们依然是你们可以注册的 最佳约会网站

translation.en: Check out my lifestyle blog for today's tips.
translation.zh: 请访问我的生活方式博客 查看今日小点子

translation.en: No gluten, no dairy, no wheat, no sugar, no...
translation.zh: 不含麸质 不含乳制品 不含小麦 不含糖 不含…

translation.en: Kicking ass, taking names, and looking fierce the entire time.
translation.zh: 狠揍对方 点名 全程看起来很凶

translation.en: Check, check, check.
translation.zh: 搞定

translation.en: [Susan] I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: I just can't let Bill Jones ruin Nick's reputation.
translation.zh: 我就是不能让比尔·琼斯 毁了尼克的名声

translation.en: Hold on.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: -Hold on? -To what?
translation.zh: -等等？ -等什么？

translation.en: [Susan] Nick!
translation.zh: 尼克

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Listen, I...
translation.zh: 听着 我…

translation.en: I have an idea. It's a little unorthodox, but...
translation.zh: 我有个主意 有点另类 但是…

translation.en: I'd like to call Arianna to the stand tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天我想传唤阿丽安娜

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: [Susan] She's being called either way.
translation.zh: 反正她都会被传唤

translation.en: It's better that we manage her testimony rather than react to it.
translation.zh: 我们最好掌控她的证词 而不是被动应对

translation.en: So we take the wind out of Love Guaranteed's sails.
translation.zh: 所以我们可以打击恋爱保证的信心

translation.en: [Susan] I have no way of knowing what Arianna will say.
translation.zh: 我没办法知道阿丽安娜会说什么

translation.en: But it will show the court that you're not taking this lying down.
translation.zh: 但这能向法庭证明你会就此罢休

translation.en: You're an honorable guy, Nick, and that's gonna come through.
translation.zh: 你是个值得尊敬的人 尼克 你会撑过去的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Susan...
translation.zh: 苏珊…

translation.en: I'll see you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天见

translation.en: I hate you, Tiffany!
translation.zh: 我讨厌你 蒂芙尼

translation.en: [Susan] Before calling Nicholas Evans to the stand,
translation.zh: 在传唤尼古拉斯·埃文斯作证前

translation.en: the plaintiff would like to call Ms. Arianna Silver.
translation.zh: 原告想先传唤阿丽安娜·西尔弗小姐

translation.en: -Objection, that's my witness. -[judge] All right, Counsel.
translation.zh: -反对 那是我的证人 -好的 律师

translation.en: Come to the bench, please.
translation.zh: 请到前面来

translation.en: You can't do this. Arianna Silver is a witness for the defense.
translation.zh: 你不能这么做 阿丽安娜·西尔弗 是被告方的证人

translation.en: [Susan] And you will have plenty of time to cross examine.
translation.zh: 你会有足够的时间进行交叉询问

translation.en: She's trying to steal my witness.
translation.zh: 她向偷走我的证人

translation.en: All right, listen up.
translation.zh: 好的 听好了

translation.en: If Ms. Whitaker somehow thinks the defense’s witness will help her case,
translation.zh: 如果惠特克小姐觉得 被告方的证人能对她的官司有帮助

translation.en: then she has the right to call whoever she wants.
translation.zh: 那么她有权传唤任何人

translation.en: And as she pointed out, Mr. Jones,
translation.zh: 正如她指出的 琼斯先生

translation.en: you will have your chance during cross.
translation.zh: 交叉询问中你有机会提问

translation.en: So yes, I'm going to allow it.
translation.zh: 所以可以 我允许她传唤

translation.en: Back you go.
translation.zh: 你们回去继续吧

translation.en: [whispering] This isn't fair.
translation.zh: 这不公平

translation.en: Thank you, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 谢谢 法官大人

translation.en: The plaintiff calls Ms. Arianna Silver to the stand.
translation.zh: 原告传唤阿丽安娜·西尔弗上庭

translation.en: Do you swear to tell the truth, the whole truth and nothing but the truth?
translation.zh: 你发誓提供的证据属实 并且完全真实 唯有真实？

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我发誓

translation.en: Ms. Silver, how did you know Mr. Evans?
translation.zh: 西尔弗小姐 你是怎么认识埃文斯先生的？

translation.en: He's my ex-fiance.
translation.zh: 他是我的前未婚夫

translation.en: And for the question on everyone's mind.
translation.zh: 下面这个问题大家都想问

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 出了什么事？

translation.en: I left him.
translation.zh: 我离开了他

translation.en: For someone else.
translation.zh: 为了另外一个人

translation.en: I'm getting married next month.
translation.zh: 我下个月要结婚了

translation.en: [Susan] Congratulations.
translation.zh: 恭喜你

translation.en: To put it plainly, Ms. Silver,
translation.zh: 坦率地说 西尔弗小姐

translation.en: It is my presumption that the defense named you as a witness in hopes
translation.zh: 我假设是辩方把你列为证人是希望

translation.en: to reflect negatively on Mr. Evans' character.
translation.zh: 你能提供证据 显示埃文斯先生个性中不好的一面

translation.en: When I spoke to Mr. Jones,
translation.zh: 我跟琼斯先生谈的时候

translation.en: about being a witness, I did mention that I thought
translation.zh: 关于出庭作证 我的确提到我觉得

translation.en: Nick was licking his wounds.
translation.zh: 尼克是在舔舐自己的伤口

translation.en: I mean, a thousand dates and you couldn't find someone new?
translation.zh: 我是说 1000次约会 你找不到新的对象？

translation.en: [sighs] Seemed a little fishy to me.
translation.zh: 我觉得有点可疑

translation.en: And do you still feel the same way?
translation.zh: 你还是有同样的感受吗？

translation.en: Actually, no.
translation.zh: 实际上没有了

translation.en: Nick is a great guy.
translation.zh: 尼克是个很棒的人

translation.en: He's all about being honest.
translation.zh: 他很诚实

translation.en: So I assume that this lawsuit is on the up and up.
translation.zh: 所以我认为 这次诉讼建立在诚实真诚上

translation.en: I only wish him well.
translation.zh: 我只希望他一切安好

translation.en: [Susan] Thank you for your time, Ms. Silver.
translation.zh: 谢谢你抽出时间前来 西尔弗小姐

translation.en: Defendant's witness.
translation.zh: 被告方询问证人

translation.en: No questions.
translation.zh: 没有问题

translation.en: [judge] If there are no questions,
translation.zh: 如果没有问题

translation.en: then the witness can be excused.
translation.zh: 证人可以退下了

translation.en: And we'll take a 15-minute recess
translation.zh: 原告出庭作证前

translation.en: before the plaintiff takes the stand.
translation.zh: 我们休庭15分钟

translation.en: [Nick] Arianna?
translation.zh: 阿丽安娜

translation.en: I just want to thank you.
translation.zh: 我只是想谢谢你

translation.en: I'm sorry how things ended with us.
translation.zh: 抱歉我们两个的事是这样的结局

translation.en: It's my fault.
translation.zh: 是我的错

translation.en: [sighs] I'm not proud of it,
translation.zh: 我没有因此自豪

translation.en: but I did learn from it.
translation.zh: 但我的确吸取了教训

translation.en: I'm with the right person now.
translation.zh: 我现在找对人了

translation.en: I'm happy for you.
translation.zh: 我为你开心

translation.en: I'm happy for you too.
translation.zh: 我也为你开心

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -[Arianna] I know that look.
translation.zh: -你在说什么？ -我知道那种眼神

translation.en: You're in love with your lawyer.
translation.zh: 你爱上了你的律师

translation.en: I just hope you can admit it to yourself, before it's too late.
translation.zh: 我就是希望在一切都太迟以前 你要对自己承认这一点

translation.en: But what if she doesn't feel the same way?
translation.zh: 但如果她不爱我呢？

translation.en: What if I get hurt again?
translation.zh: 如果我再次受伤呢？

translation.en: There are no guarantees in love, Nick.
translation.zh: 恋爱中没有保障 尼克

translation.en: Isn't that what this is all about?
translation.zh: 不就是这样的吗？

translation.en: [bailiff] Do you swear to tell the truth, the whole truth and nothing but the truth?
translation.zh: 你发誓提供的证据属实 并且完全真实 唯有真实？

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我发誓

translation.en: [Susan] Mr. Evans,
translation.zh: 埃文斯先生

translation.en: in your own words, please,
translation.zh: 请用你自己的语言

translation.en: tell the court how Love Guaranteed deceived and damaged you
translation.zh: 告诉法庭恋爱保证是如何用虚假承诺

translation.en: with their false promises.
translation.zh: 欺骗和伤害你的

translation.en: [whispering] Just say whatever comes to mind.
translation.zh: 想到什么就说什么

translation.en: When I started this whole thing,
translation.zh: 当我开始这整件事的时候

translation.en: I was out for justice.
translation.zh: 我出来是为了正义

translation.en: Love isn't something you can just guarantee.
translation.zh: 爱情不是你能保证的东西

translation.en: Like a pizza delivery.
translation.zh: 好像披萨外送那样

translation.en: [whispering] I'm sorry, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 抱歉 你在干什么？

translation.en: Love is unpredictable.
translation.zh: 爱情是不可预测的

translation.en: And it can burn you.
translation.zh: 它能伤害你

translation.en: But it can also surprise you
translation.zh: 但也能让你获得惊喜

translation.en: in the most remarkable ways.
translation.zh: 用最显著的方式

translation.en: It turns out I did find love,
translation.zh: 结果我真的找到了爱情

translation.en: when I fell in love with my lawyer.
translation.zh: 我爱上了我的律师

translation.en: Ms. Whitaker herself said she subscribed to Love Guaranteed.
translation.zh: 惠特克小姐自己说过 她注册了恋爱保证

translation.en: If Nick Evans is in love with her,
translation.zh: 如果尼克·埃文斯爱上了她

translation.en: this lawsuit has to be dismissed.
translation.zh: 这项诉讼可以撤销了

translation.en: Folks, we must have order in the courtroom.
translation.zh: 各位 法庭内保持秩序

translation.en: There's no need for dismissal, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 不需要撤销 法官大人

translation.en: I'm dropping the lawsuit.
translation.zh: 我不起诉了

translation.en: Mr. Jones is right.
translation.zh: 琼斯先生说得对

translation.en: While I didn't meet Susan through the site, I met her because of it.
translation.zh: 我没有通过这个网站认识苏珊 但我因为这个网站认识了她

translation.en: And I promised to tell the truth under oath, so...
translation.zh: 我承诺过要说真话

translation.en: I'd much rather have love in my life than win here in court today.
translation.zh: 比起今天在法庭上赢 我更愿意在生活中有爱

translation.en: It's an amazing thing when you find someone who gets you.
translation.zh: 找到一个懂你 你也懂她的人

translation.en: And you get them in return.
translation.zh: 是一件很美妙的事

translation.en: Even when they're right and you're wrong.
translation.zh: 哪怕她们是对的 你是错的

translation.en: Turns out the saying is, "You've got another think coming."
translation.zh: 结果俗话说“你应该再想想”

translation.en: -[chuckles] -[Nick] It really is, I Googled it. Weird.
translation.zh: 真的是这样 我上网查了 奇怪

translation.en: A wise old man once told me to dive in, so...
translation.zh: 一位有智慧的老人 曾经告诉我要深潜下去 所以…

translation.en: here it goes.
translation.zh: 就这么做

translation.en: What I realized,
translation.zh: 我意识到

translation.en: that I don't want a guarantee.
translation.zh: 我不想要保证

translation.en: Or a safety net.
translation.zh: 或者是安全网

translation.en: All I want...
translation.zh: 我想要的

translation.en: is to take a chance with you.
translation.zh: 是有机会和你在一起

translation.en: It's not a risk to fall in love.
translation.zh: 爱上某人不是风险

translation.en: It's a risk not to.
translation.zh: 不爱才是风险

translation.en: I love you, Susan.
translation.zh: 我爱你 苏珊

translation.en: Do you love me too?
translation.zh: 你也爱我吗？

translation.en: Ms. Whitaker, answer that question.
translation.zh: 惠特克小姐 回答问题

translation.en: I do!
translation.zh: 我爱

translation.en: I give you all the credit, I do.
translation.zh: 我把一切功劳都归功于你 真的

translation.en: -I'm so proud of you. -My man!
translation.zh: -我为你感到非常自豪 -我的兄弟

translation.en: -You smell like wine. -A little bit.
translation.zh: -你一身酒气 -有点

translation.en: -Ms. Whitaker? -[Susan] Yes.
translation.zh: -惠特克小姐? -是我

translation.en: Ms. Taylor would like a word with you. Please.
translation.zh: 泰勒小姐想和你谈谈 拜托

translation.en: When I studied with my Lama in Tibet, he said,
translation.zh: 我在西藏跟喇嘛学习的时候 他说

translation.en: "The thousand brilliant accomplishments of the past do not serve today's purpose."
translation.zh: “过去的几千个辉煌成就 无法再为今天的目的服务”

translation.en: -I'm sorry, I'm not following. -[Tamara] I'll pay your legal fees,
translation.zh: 抱歉 我没听懂 我会支付你的法律费用 我还会捐25万到你的医院

translation.en: and I'll donate 250 thousand to your hospital,
translation.zh: 我会支付你的法律费用 我还会捐25万到你的医院

translation.en: if you two become the new face of Love Guaranteed.
translation.zh: 只要你们两个成为 恋爱保证网站的新面孔

translation.en: -Why would you do that? -An old-fashioned love story
translation.zh: 你为什么要这么做？ 一个老套的爱情故事

translation.en: complete with a romantic courtroom confession?
translation.zh: 完成了一个浪漫的法庭认罪？

translation.en: People love that crap.
translation.zh: 人们喜欢这样的东西

translation.en: I mean...
translation.zh: 我是说…

translation.en: It's gonna make me look so good on social media. It's not hard...
translation.zh: 这能让我在社交媒体上形象良好 不难 但是…

translation.en: It's much better than the fake poster couple we have now.
translation.zh: 这比我们现在看到的 海报上的假情侣好多了

translation.en: I knew it!
translation.zh: 我就知道

translation.en: Brad and Veronica.
translation.zh: 布拉德和维罗妮卡

translation.en: -He did, he called that. Hm-- -I called that.
translation.zh: -他看穿了 他就是那么称呼他们的 -我就那样称呼

translation.en: Two hundred and fifty thousand for the hospital. That's a lot,
translation.zh: 对于这家医院来说 25万是一大笔钱 但我们追求的损失费是100万

translation.en: but we were seeking a million in damages.
translation.zh: 25万是一大笔钱 但我们追求的损失费是100万

translation.en: And let's face it, we could've had it, so...
translation.zh: 让我们面对吧 我们本来能拥有的 所以…

translation.en: But you didn't.
translation.zh: 但你没有

translation.en: -We could've though. -How about 500 thousand?
translation.zh: -不过我们本来可以的 -50万怎么样？

translation.en: Deal.
translation.zh: 成交

translation.en: -Wow. -[Susan chuckles]
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: The jury still out on whether a dating site can guarantee love.
translation.zh: 陪审团还在讨论 约会网站是否能保证爱情

translation.en: But love guarantees a happy ending.
translation.zh: 但恋爱保证有了一个美满结局

translation.en: So what do we do now? Go on an official first date?
translation.zh: 那么现在我们怎么办？ 进行第一次正式约会？

translation.en: Anything but a first date.
translation.zh: 除了第一次约会 干什么都行

translation.en: ♪ Children behave ♪
translation.zh: （免责声明：爱是无法保证的） （副作用可能包括 心痛 易怒 压力 紧张）

translation.en: ♪ That's what they say When we're together ♪
translation.zh: （副作用可能包括 心痛 易怒 压力 紧张） （偎依 睡眠不佳 眩晕 兴高采烈 分享炸薯条）

translation.en: ♪ And watch how you play ♪
translation.zh: （通货紧缩 体重增加 说孩子气的话 生孩子 突然的情绪变化）

translation.en: ♪ They don't understand ♪
translation.zh: （在对方亲戚家度假 睡沙发 游戏之夜）

translation.en: ♪ And so we're running Just as fast as we can ♪
translation.zh: （在对方亲戚家度假 睡沙发 游戏之夜） （温暖的感觉 金融危机 夏威夷 亲吻脖子…）
